what: Glossaries that Explain the Census API's Decennial Group Tables
title: Glossaries that Explain the Census API's Decennial Group Tables
text: hercdectables data package contains glossaries US Census groups. glossary mapping variable names collection explicit values variables encode. example, variable Census database might report count number people one demographic group living one type housing primarily speaking one language. glossary group include columns demographic group, housing type, primary language. glossaries explain Census API’s Decennial group tables.
